title: C++ Primer
This book contains an in-depth coverage of a wide range of topics in C++. An excellent book for students aiming to gain an insight into the practical aspects of C++

note: A must read for the practical C++ programmer.
title: Effective C++
This book gives excellent tips and tricks for writing C++ code. An easy to follow language makes the book inviting to read and keeps the readerâ€™s attention riveted till the very end

note: z Jesse Liberty (1998), C++ Unleashed, Sams. This book contains a number of excellent case studies on the practical application areas of C++, such as CORBA, Data Structures, COM, and Data Persistence. It is highly recommended for the practical C++ programmer.
title: The C++ Programming Language, 2nd end, Pearson Education, Asia. This book has been written by the creator of C++ himself. It is an excellent reference book on the C++ language

note: An easy language and plenty of solved examples are the salient features of the book.
title: Teach Yourself C++
This is a good book for learning the fundamentals of C++. Well-arranged topics make the book easy to read. A number of advanced concepts have been included in this book
C++ Primer Plus
This is a good book for learning the fundamentals of C++

container-title: The book gives a good coverage of the various aspects of programming in C++
title: Object Oriented Programming with C+
This is a popular book on C++ in the Indian market
